title: Speaking of Harvey
creator_credit: Eric Friedl and Pyramid Film and Video
brief_description: Considers the issue of animal experimentation in the world of science, as seen through the eyes of a young research scientist working with the liver physiology of de-arterialized livers. He raises he issues of vivisections rather clearly and tries to persuade us that we can carry out these experiments “Humanly”. Raises issues surrounding animal experimentation.
